title: Mario Basics
description: Test your knowledge of the Mushroom Kingdom's hero!

questions.question: What is Mario's brother's name?
questions.explanation: Luigi is Mario's younger twin brother, known for his green outfit and taller, thinner appearance!

questions.question: Princess Peach rules the Mushroom Kingdom.
questions.explanation: Princess Peach is the ruler of the Mushroom Kingdom and is frequently rescued by Mario from Bowser!

questions.question: What is the name of Mario's main enemy?
questions.explanation: Bowser, also known as King Koopa, is the main antagonist who constantly kidnaps Princess Peach!

questions.question: What job did Mario originally have?
questions.explanation: Mario was originally a carpenter in the arcade game Donkey Kong (1981). He became a plumber later!

questions.question: Yoshi is a dinosaur that Mario can ride.
questions.explanation: Yoshi is Mario's friendly dinosaur companion who first appeared in Super Mario World and can eat enemies with his long tongue!

questions.question: What does Mario collect for extra lives?
questions.explanation: Collecting 100 coins gives Mario an extra life! Green 1-Up Mushrooms also grant extra lives.

questions.question: What color is Mario's hat?
questions.explanation: Mario wears his iconic red cap with an 'M' on it, along with his red shirt and blue overalls!

questions.question: Toads are the mushroom-headed citizens of the Mushroom Kingdom.
questions.explanation: Toads are the mushroom-like inhabitants who serve Princess Peach and often help Mario on his adventures!
